metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.description: Primavera organization for senior citizens, LASCA (Latin American Senior Citizens Association), interviews with members. Sporting news , updates on Euro Cup and Maradona paternity suit. Footage of Caravela portugesa, a traditional Portugese dance troop.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Nosotros #16. Portuguese Canadian Folk Club; "Caravela Portugesa. Victor Sara. Festival 92"
metadata.subject: La tercera edad; senior citizens; Primavera; LASCA (Latin American Senior Citizens Association); La copa europa; Euro Cup; Maradona; litigio de paternidad; paternity suit; La Caravela portugesa; bailadores; dancers
